summary: Reality blur from advanced video AI, mass protests during a US shutdown, and coups amid climate disasters.

events.details: Federal funding lapses, halting pay for millions of workers.
OpenAI's text-to-video model generates 60-second photorealistic clips, fueling protest disinformation.
Military ousts President Andry Rajoelina after months of demonstrations.
Hamas releases 20 hostages to the Red Cross; Israel frees 1,900 detainees.
5â€“7 million protesters rally nationwide against authoritarian drift.
Government-linked militias kill over 2,500 civilians in Darfur city.
Microsoft's Phi-4 and IBM's Granite 4.0 release efficient instruction-tuned models.
Category 5 storm strikes Jamaica with near 300 km/h winds.
